resources.string: For optimal performance, some files must be downloaded to the sd card. If you choose not to do this now, each page will take significantly longer to load. Would you like to download the required files now?
Would you like to download the required translations now?
Please wait for the files to download.
Please wait the files are processed.

Quran Android is a free, open source Quran application for Android.
Upcoming features include: 
- Translations.
- Search.
- And more..

La tansawna men saleh el doaa.

- Font size too small? Try flipping your screen to landscape mode for a zoomed in version. 
- Change pages by swiping your finger across the screen or by using the arrow keys or trackball. 
- Long press on any page to bring up the option to bookmark a page. 
- You can add as many bookmarks as you'd like. Long press on a bookmark to remove it. 
- The application remembers the last page you were reading and displays it when you restart the app. 
- Don't forget to check out the settings.
Full Screen Mode.\nHave a larger view area for pages.
Show Clock in full screen mode.
